featured.text: Those who have positive feelings about their stuck songs prefer to just “let them be,” while those with negative feelings turn to more behavioral responses, which include coping strategies such as singing, talking, or even praying. 49.
How people cope with their earworms seems to depend on how they feel about them.
Grieving is a natural 29 for coping with loss of a loved one, and people grieve in various ways.
After she graduates, Deborah plans to use her knowledge to educate people how to best take care of their bodies and cope with the feelings of hopelessness that she remembers so well.
Understanding how pain works in the mind and brain could eventually give doctors tools for helping people cope with painful medical treatments.

definition.en_def: To deal effectively with something difficult.
definition.example: She learned to cope with stress through meditation.
